abstract_summ: By the spring of 2020 the COVID-19 outbreak caused by the new SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus has become a pandemic, requiring fast and efficient reaction from societies and health care systems all over the world . Fever, coughing and dyspnea are considered the major signs of the infection . Neurological signs or symptoms appear in 30-50% of hospitalized patients, with higher incidence in those with more severe disease . Classical acute neurological syndromes have also been reported to associate with COVID .
